rows.text_1_facilitator:
Welcome back! Today‚Äôs skill is about how you and your spouse can set an example for your children by creating respect at home. üíô 

Family and friends might have their own ideas about how you should act as a spouse or a parent.‚ùó

But what matters most is how both husband and wife choose to talk to and support each other, and make decisions together and respectfully. üîÑ

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Welcome back! Today‚Äôs skill is about how you and your spouse can set an example for your children by creating respect at home. üíô 

Family and friends might have their own ideas about how you should act as a spouse or a parent.‚ùó

But what matters most is how both husband and wife choose to talk to and support each other, and make decisions together and respectfully. üîÑ

text_2.eng: Treating each other with respect and making decisions together can have a big impact on how you feel and can help keep your child feel safe. üíöüòÉ

rows.text_2: Treating each other with respect and making decisions together can have a big impact on how you feel and can help keep your child feel safe. üíöüòÉ

rows.text_1_facilitator: Think about working as a team! Try this.

text_1_facilitator.eng: Think about working as a team! Try this.

quiz_1_question.eng: True or False: Important decisions that impact the whole family or the relationship should only be made by one spouse.

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng:
‚ùå Incorrect. 

üîë When making big decisions that impact the whole family or relationship, it is important for spouses to practise making decisions together.

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng:
üéâ You are right! 

üîë Communicating and making big decisions together with our spouse is an important part of having a respectful relationship.

rows.quiz_1_question: True or False: Important decisions that impact the whole family or the relationship should only be made by one spouse.
rows.quiz_1_feedback_1:
‚ùå Incorrect. 

üîë When making big decisions that impact the whole family or relationship, it is important for spouses to practise making decisions together.
rows.quiz_1_feedback_2:
üéâ You are right! 

üîë Communicating and making big decisions together with our spouse is an important part of having a respectful relationship.

rows.text_1_facilitator: Let‚Äôs observe how couples can value each other‚Äôs opinions and make decisions together:

text_1_facilitator.eng: Let‚Äôs observe how couples can value each other‚Äôs opinions and make decisions together:

character_1_text.eng: My dear, you look worried. What‚Äôs wrong?

rows.character_1_text: My dear, you look worried. What‚Äôs wrong?
The stove has not been working very well recently. I think the stove might be broken.

character_1_text.eng: The stove has not been working very well recently. I think the stove might be broken.

character_2_text.eng: I noticed this too when I was cooking last week. I wanted to ask you: do you think we should buy a new one?

rows.character_2_text: I noticed this too when I was cooking last week. I wanted to ask you: do you think we should buy a new one?

rows.character_1_text: Buying a new one would be really expensive. How about we talk about it after dinner, and we can make a decision together?

character_1_text.eng: Buying a new one would be really expensive. How about we talk about it after dinner, and we can make a decision together?

character_2_text.eng: That sounds great. Thank you for cooking dinner, my dear!

rows.character_2_text: That sounds great. Thank you for cooking dinner, my dear!

rows.character_1_text: I am grateful we can talk about this and make this decision together. It makes a lot more sense to try to get it repaired first.

character_1_text.eng: I am grateful we can talk about this and make this decision together. It makes a lot more sense to try to get it repaired first.

character_2_text.eng: Me too. I feel a lot better now that we have talked about it together.

rows.character_2_text: Me too. I feel a lot better now that we have talked about it together.

rows.text_1_facilitator: 4Ô∏è‚É£ Here are four simple steps that you and your spouse can use to create respect at home for your children to learn from:

text_1_facilitator.eng: 4Ô∏è‚É£ Here are four simple steps that you and your spouse can use to create respect at home for your children to learn from:

section_1_text.eng:
üí° Involve your spouse in decision making processes.
üíô Try this the next time you are making a decision.

section_2_text.eng:
üòÉ It can be hard to know how to involve your spouse when making a decision. 
‚ú® You can try by asking them what they think. 
üíö This shows them you care and want them to be involved.

section_3_text.eng: ‚è∞ Choose a time when you and your spouse are not too busy to discuss decisions, such as early in the morning or later in the evening.

section_4_text.eng:
‚è∞ It can take time to get used to making decisions together. 
üîÑ Give yourself time and keep trying! 
üòÉ By communicating with your spouse, you‚Äôll both feel more comfortable talking and sharing decisions over time.

rows.section_1_text:
üí° Involve your spouse in decision making processes.
üíô Try this the next time you are making a decision.
rows.section_2_text:
üòÉ It can be hard to know how to involve your spouse when making a decision. 
‚ú® You can try by asking them what they think. 
üíö This shows them you care and want them to be involved.
rows.section_3_text: ‚è∞ Choose a time when you and your spouse are not too busy to discuss decisions, such as early in the morning or later in the evening.
rows.section_4_text:
‚è∞ It can take time to get used to making decisions together. 
üîÑ Give yourself time and keep trying! 
üòÉ By communicating with your spouse, you‚Äôll both feel more comfortable talking and sharing decisions over time.

rows.quiz_1_question: Your home activity for today is to involve your spouse in a decision you are making today. Can you do it? ‚è∞‚≠ê

quiz_1_question.eng: Your home activity for today is to involve your spouse in a decision you are making today. Can you do it? ‚è∞‚≠ê

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: Well done! Communicating and working together with your spouse makes a difference! üéâ

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng:
It can take time to get used to making decisions together. Give yourself time to adjust. ‚è∞

Remember that by communicating with your spouse and involving them in decision-making, they will start to feel more comfortable doing so too. ‚≠ê
